title: 4 Lies People Believe About Love | Unapologetic 80
itunes:title: 4 Lies People Believe About Love | Unapologetic 80
description: What does love look like in today's culture? We can love our dog, our favorite sports team, and our neighbor. Christians are accused of being unloving when we oppose the LGBTQ agenda or support political agendas. We unpack this and more on today's episode.
